section.p: Chambara, a city built on a grid pattern at the mouth of the Moku River, is the imperial capital of Akatsurai. It is here that the Sovereign has his palace, at the north end of Chrysanthemum Avenue.

p.if: You can buy a town house here for 350 Shards. If you do, cross off the money and put a tick in the box beside the town house option below.

choices.choice: Go to your town house {box} (if box ticked)
